amendment.description: Amendment amends the "Buy Indian Act" to include energy products and energy by-products.
amendment.purpose: Part B amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 107-178 to amend existing law to give the Secretary of the Interior the discretion to purchase energy products and energy by-products of Indian industry in the open market.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hayworth amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
